name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive expertise in **AWS**, **GCP**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **Jenkins**, and **Ansible**. I excel in deploying robust and scalable infrastructure using **Infrastructure as Code** practices. My solid background in **CI/CD** pipelines, cloud security, and monitoring with tools such as **Grafana** and **Prometheus** empowers me to ensure seamless continuous deployment and effective system monitoring.
In addition to my core DevOps skills, I possess a rich foundation in **Python**, **Node.js**, and **Bash**, enabling me to automate tasks and streamline processes. I have a history of building high-performance solutions in both healthcare and financial sectors, applying my knowledge of event-driven systems and microservices architecture. My capacity to develop and implement machine learning pipelines further enhances my contributions, adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am dedicated to enhancing system security and performance while fostering collaborative DevOps culture within teams.
